title: Success For U.S.-Backed Fighters In Syria Leads To Political Complications
teaser: Along with U.S. airstrikes, Syrian Kurds pushed the Islamic State out of key turf on the Turkish border. The U.S. sees it as a model for fighting ISIS but Turkey worries the Kurds are going too far.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
